name: fastify-app
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.test: npm run build:ts && npm run copy-files && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && tap --ts "test/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:ts && fastify start -l info dist/app.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build:ts && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "npm:watch:ts" "npm:dev:start"
scripts.dev:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js
